song.title: Living, Again and Again (Marcus John Mix)
song.info:
Living, Again and Again (Marcus John Mix) 3:43 el blanco [fulcrum]
Greetz to Bannor, his lady and their new spawn. Dedicated to the spawn.
This is a complete remake of an old tune of mine, done up with a healthy dose of reFX's Slayer2 for rocking goodness.
